title: Added the code needed in order to get the N1 and N2 nighttime buses also. This…
message:
Added the code needed in order to get the N1 and N2 nighttime buses also. This doesn't perfectly work yet, since sometimes interwined T1 are put at the end of night buses.
Yet, we have the N1 and N2 at least! We'll see how it works during daytime.
Please notice that in order to do so I added a new field in the stop_times table, called late_night

title: Optimized queries, changed a little bit the database (with maybe a bug with…
message:
Optimized queries, changed a little bit the database (with maybe a bug with nocturnal bugs, damnit ACTV!)

It seems like night buses which still rely to the present day have the following hours in timetables:
24 -> midnight
25 -> one am
26 -> two am

and so on...

BUT

if I change 25 with 01 what I get is that a bus which would be - let's say - late night on friday evening would be then moved to early friday morning. I'd like to be able to move it to early SATURDAY morning, but it's not so easy.
